About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a Software Engineer. I love to play with different technologies. I always believe in learning, because in this field you always need to be updated with the new technology comming into the market.

These days I am also trying to put my hands on content writing by trying to writing technical blogs, You can reach out to my blog site by clicking Developer's Desk.

I have experience of 2+ year in this industry. Currently I am working on Bacancy Technology as a Software Engineer. My skills includes HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, AJAX, Sass, Bootstrap, PHP, Laravel, Python, REST APIs, MySQL, SQL, JSON, GIT, React JS and many more are on their way...

My Experience details are mension bellow:

KSSBM

Full Stack Developer

KSSBM is a Education Organization, I work there in a group of 2 people, and create a system for them, which manages students, staff, subjects, batches, attendance, and generate different type of reports.

RN Inspire Services PVt. Ltd.

Full Stack Developer

RN Inspire is a small startup, I work there in a group of 2 people, and we create a web application named WFS [Work Flow Structure], which manages inquires and orders of products, it also manages stock, godown, delevery vehicles and drivers, inventory, billing.

Bacancy Technology

Software Engineer

Bacancy Technology is a MNC. I am currently working here as full time Software Engineer and worked on more than 5 projects and currently working on a healthcare project which is based on Texas.
